sentences.english: S. and conducted all sorts of intelligence activities for Umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 的隊長，並且爲安布雷拉執行了各種各樣的諜報活動。

sentences.english: No sooner had the spy returned home than he was told to go to another country.
sentences.chinese: 那個諜報員剛踏進國門就被受命要去他國。

sentences.english: Our spies report that troops are being moved to the border.
sentences.chinese: 我方諜報人員報告部隊正在向邊境調動。

sentences.english: Several of his staff members have military-intelligence backgrounds.
sentences.chinese: 此中的一些有軍事諜報事變背景。

sentences.english: The episode could reasonably serve as a unique epic of royal espionage !
sentences.chinese: 這段歷史可說是王室諜報活動中獨一無二的華章。

sentences.english: That's one of the challenges of being a spy or case officer.
sentences.chinese: 這只不過是特工或諜報人員要面臨的考驗之一。

definition: the Kempeitai or Japanese Military Police 1881-1945 (Japanese counterpart of the Gestapo during WWII)
Yasukuni Shrine, Shinto shrine in Tokyo to Japanese war dead, controversial as burial ground of several Class A war criminals
Frank Chang-ting Hsieh (1946-), Taiwanese DPP politician, mayor of Kaohsiung 1998-2005
North and South Korea/bilateral Korean relations
